# sync-backlog

Synchronizes the local backlog with GitHub Issues and project boards. Pulls open issues, maps them to teams, updates local tracking documents, and identifies stale or unassigned work items.

## Usage

Invoke this skill when you need to perform the `sync-backlog` operation.

1. Parse any arguments provided
2. Scan relevant files to understand the current state
3. Execute the task following project conventions
4. Validate the output against quality gates
5. Report results clearly
